posts.post_content:
SOLD

PM's or posts get priority in order received according to the time stamp.

Regular Paypal preferred. Check or m/o OK.
--Christopher.

Only Davis remains: Now 35% below VCP averages.
T206 Davis, George; SGC 40 SOLD

bump for new cards added and new prices.

Bump. Only Davis remains. Now $86.00 (25% off VCP)

This card is gettin' pretty cheap :)

Best,
Scott

[quote name="scottglevy" post=1018706]This card is gettin' pretty cheap :)

Scott,
That's what I thought also. 

Not sure how much lower I can go at this point. 

There are some tobacco stains on the bottom left on the back which is, understandably, a deal breaker for a lot of collectors. 

Mr. Davis will go back into the vault if he isn't sold before the National.

--C.
